[if session last_search] [set name=arg interpolate=1][data session last_search][/set] [else] [set name=arg]/[/set] [/else] [/if] [tag op=header interpolate=1] Status: 302 moved Location: [area href="[scratch arg]"] [/tag][comment] This page redirects the user to the last search that was saved. If no search is present, then they will go to the index page. [/comment]
